If you enjoy Portuguese Cuisine, youve probably tried one of his recipes. These dishes are the true Portuguese recipes that created the famed Ironbound Portuguese Restaurants. Manuel had been a head chef in Newark since 1969 when he brought his uniqueness and creativity to South River. Today he continues the same recipes and traditions with his children, ensuring that the culture and beloved Portuguese cuisine will continue for many generations to come.A casual atmosphere with the most professional and courteous attention paid to all our guests. We are one of the few restaurants that still prepares every dish from scratch. The food alone is worth the ride. You will find an outgoing and friendly staff that have been with us for many years. name: Villa Borghese
others: Cuisines: Mediterranean, Caterers, Sandwiches, Take Out, Italian, European, Healthy, Seafood, Vegetarian, Vegan, Continental, Pizza
general_info: Villa Borghese Italian Restaurant and Pizzeria is sure to satisfy your taste buds. With traditions brought back from the old school, Villa Borghese brings Old style cooking to a modern world. Atmosphere & Service Dining in Villa Borghese is an experience unlike any other. While you are enjoying our delicious food, look around our dining room and let your imagination run wild. The hand painted murals of the old Italian landscape and very important people of years gone by, whisk you back to a simpler place and time when quality service and sumptuous dishes were the norm. The service in Villa Borghese is also top shelf. These days, big corporations running dining establishments sometimes forget the real importance of breaking bread with friends and family. But Villa Borghese doesn't allow you to forget how important it is. The waitresses develop a rapport with you that you will not experience anywhere else. And there is a real relationship between owner and customer. It is not rare that the owner will come out and have a glass of wine with you and your family. That's what's really important. There's always a place for you at Villa Borghese !! About Us Villa Borghese was founded in 1970 by Sal and Joe Russo. In 1987 it was sold to three brothers ( current owners ) who by coincidence also shared the last name of Russo. These three brothers are Phil, Jack and Sam Russo. These brothers had already been in business operating a deli in Elizabeth, a restaurant in Ortly Beach, and a Stella Doro route also in Elizabeth. The city of Fords embraced the new owners with open arms. They in turn, kept Villa Borghese a good Italian family restaurant, and made it into a modern day classic.

general_info: Located in the borough of Staten Island, New York. This beautiful inn serves as a restaurant, wedding and party facility. The mansion has been extended but the original part of the mansion still remains in use. An event at our inn will be an affair to remember long after the candles have gone out. As you drive up to the grounds, past our botanical gardens be confident that every detail has been thought of. Step into our home and be pampered by a team of gracious and professionally trained staff. Our beautifully appointed rooms are transformed into grand cocktail rooms with stations full of gourmet food to delight your taste buds. Once the parsonage of St. Luke's Church in the 1840's, this Victorian masterpiece was restored to its original grandeur and is now the beautiful location for our country Bed and Breakfast. Each of our four suites is rich in historical detail, charmingly enhanced with timeless antiques, yet equipped with modern amenities. Our Grand Parlor offers relaxing piano music and a cozy fireplace or all our guests. Accompanied by our warm and gracious hospitality. The Cottage is the perfect setting for a honeymoon, anniversary, or a surprise romantic getaway with a loved one. name: Aunt Butchies of Brooklyn
address: 4864 Arthur Kill Rd, Staten Island, NY 10309
others: Cuisines: Mediterranean, American, Italian, Dessert, European, Bakeries, Continental
general_info:
Bit of Brooklyn brought to Staten Island. Home of New York's favorite chocolate mousse cake and gourmet foods. Serving lunch and dinner daily but closed on Mondays. Private parties are welcome and gift certificates are available. 
 
When the Italian eatery and dessert shop Aunt Butchie's of Brooklyn arrived in Richmond Valley two and a half years ago, relatives of the owners thought they were taking a big risk. 
 
Now nearly three years and two expansions later, the South Shore lunch, dinner and dessert hot spot is doing well, say its owners. They recently took over a spacious storefront and added 125 seats to what is now the restaurant's party room.  
 
Aunt Butchie's of Brooklyn was born in Bay Ridge. Other locations are in the Manhattan side of the Staten Island Ferry terminal and Kennedy Airport's Jet Blue terminal. 
 
Unlike those sites, the Staten Island location operates as a full restaurant and bakery, with options for customers to pick-up and order delivery. Lunch – salads, sandwiches (27 on the menu) – are also available at the Staten Island eatery. 
 
The full bakery offers a host of treats, including chocolate mousse cake, Italian pastries, cookies, coffee, and more. 
 
Dinner choices on the menu feature chicken, veal, seafood, pork and vegetarian entrees, as well as pasta, soups, and appetizers. 
 
Everything we make is homemade and that's the difference in the taste.It takes time but according to our customers it is worth it. 
 
Aunt Butchie's of Brooklyn is located at 4864 Arthur Kill Rd. in Richmond Valley. For more information, call 718-227-0002 or 718-227-5805.

name: Red Lobster
general_info:
Fresh is in our food: 
Each day, you’ll find an updated selection of fresh fish on our Today’s Fresh Fish menu, not to mention live Maine lobster, freshly baked Cheddar Bay Biscuits™, crisp salads and a host of fresh seafood recipes waiting to be explored. 
Fresh is in our knowledge: 
No one knows seafood better than we do. As global seafood buyers, we have employees stationed throughout the world who inspect our seafood the moment it comes out of the water. They ensure it meets standards that are second to none. Then, the renowned chefs at our culinary center deliver the fresh expertise that turns it all into something truly special. 
Fresh is in our dedication: 
We hold ourselves to the highest standards for service, quality and a welcoming atmosphere. And we’re focused on doing what’s right – for our employees, in our communities and in the world. 
Fresh is in our commitment: 
You deserve the freshest food and thinking. So every time you visit one of our seafood restaurants or our online seafood store, you’ll find an uncommon commitment to deliver the best of the sea with fresh energy and fresh ideas that we hope will make you want to come back again and again

general_info: Limani Seafood Grills owner George was born in the Limani city of Piraeus, Greece. Limani means Seaport or Harbor. Every corner of Greece has its own Limani where the locals go early in the morning to pick up the fresh catch when the fish-boats come back. In our Limani in the beautiful town of Westfield you will enjoy the freshest seafood dishes, live lobsters from the tank, chilled shellfish towers, delicious salads tossed to order at the raw bar display station. Our menu features Black Angus steaks, Rack of Lamb and many other mouthwatering dishes. At Limani it's all about the food, not to mention the soothing, eye catching decor tastefully selected by your host Gigi. Enjoy a romantic dinner, or a business luncheon, or impress your family and friends every time you visit us. Plate presentation, freshness, combined with friendly professional service will impress you and your guests with every visit. Bring your favorite wine (two wine stores next block) and enjoy the best seafood around. If planning a party or special event call us for a customized menu and we will help plan your catered affair. We look forward to seeing you soon.

general_info: When we think Chevys Fresh Mex, we go to our happy place; fun-lovin’ guests, fajitas & margaritas, and the freshest food, always from scratch. Founded in 1986 in Alameda, California, Chevys is an ultra-casual restaurant concept that offers guests an array of freshly prepared Mexican dishes in a relaxing atmosphere. Similar to other Real Mex restaurants, Chevys prepares its dishes daily from scratch using only the freshest ingredients. Chevys is a national brand with locations in 8 states. Chevys' store base includes 39 Company-owned restaurant locations and 16 franchised restaurants. With more than 25 years of successful operations, Chevys is the most widely recognized Mexican casual dining brand in northern California, and is the second largest Mexican casual dining brand in California in terms of number of restaurants, behind El Torito. Designed to offer a fiesta for the senses, where every experience is fresh, fun and full of flavor, the concept is focused on the execution of its trend-setting Fresh Mex® menu and continuous innovation. It also serves a range of seafood items that includes scallops, steaks, salmon, shrimp and tuna. Arirang Hibachi Steakhouse offers various dishes for take-out. name: Rock N Joe Coffee Bar
general_info: As Rock n Joe is poised to expand on a national level, the vision for a coffee bar that went beyond what the competition was doing can still be seen in each store. Todays customers encounter a new third-wave coffee bar design, with artisan drinks focused on quality and craft with music brewing in the dcor and air. And at the heart of it all remains the brands signature blend of coffee, the same coffee that has inspired the Specialty Coffee Association of America to honor Rock n Joe with the Golden Cup award. At Rock n Joe the guest will be treated to an environment that is committed to the craft of making the perfect beverage, from our drip coffee of the day, to a special single origin coffee made in a pour-over method. Our beverage artists are committed to making the perfectly balanced delicious espresso beverages; from a shot of espresso to a vanilla latte and our signature beverages and everything in between, our goal is to ROCK you with every cup of Rock n Joe.And our Baristas say welcome to the new day. Cheers!

name: Mulberry House
others: Cuisines: Deli, Caterers, Family Style, American, French, European, Continental
general_info: Mulberry House is set in an older style Victorian House making your dining experience very unique. During the weekdays and weekends we offer Tea Service, with a choice of soup or salad and Tea Stands to include your choice of Tea Sandwiches, English Style Scones, & Sweets. We also offer Salads, Panini's & Quiche. On the weekends in addition we also offer Brunch both Saturday's & Sunday's. Come in and try our famous Stuffed French Toast w/ Wild Berry Cheesecake, or be more traditional and order our Eggs Bene. Dinner is offer both Friday & Saturday nights-BYOB; we our Farm to Table, serving dishes that are all locally sourced and even picking our own vegetables during the warmer months. We use only the best quality product and it shows in our presentation and on your plate. Pan Seared Duck Breast, Filet Mignon, Crabcakes-but definitely visit our website for our full menus offered daily as they do change seasonally. We also host all private events with our private space upstairs that can hold up to 50, or also on our first floor, with a max. of 24 guests. Baby & Bridal showers are definitely one of our specialties along with Cocktail parties and Sit Down Dinners. Also, inquire about our Outside Catering packages; we'll come to you with everything you need for your perfect party, whether its in your home our outside venue-let us cater your menu, provide servers, bartenders, even a "live" Chef as needed. We have packages for every season and also deliver!

others: Cuisines: Caterers, American, Seafood, Bar & Grills
general_info: In the midwest, "supper club" means a spot where you can not only have a great meal, but a spot that functions as a bit of a social club too - a place to enjoy remarkable food + great company. One of our favorite parts of the night, has been watching our customers interact - running into neighbors and friends, meeting up with family, or just enjoying a night out together - it's our own little social club. So, we figured what could be more apt - then calling ourselves the 100 Steps Supper Club. The "raw bar" side - well that comes from wanting a nice, traditional oyster bar to belly up to and dive into raw oysters, clams, and other great seafood. We like to think we have one of the best fishmongers in the business - fresh fish + shellfish every day sourced direct from the boat to you - so why not show off a bit!

name: Little Sheep Mongolian Hot Pot
general_info: Little Sheep Mongolian Hot Pot is a restaurant specializing in Mongolian style hot pot dining. With 36 spices and ingredients in our original soup base recipe, our flavorful broth is sure to satisfy every single one of your taste buds. The highest quality meats ranging from lamb, beef, pork, and poultry are sliced perfectly to cook within seconds of touching the simmering broth. When the mouth-watering scent of our hot pot hits you, you'll be hooked for sure! For vegetarians, we offer leafy greens, mushrooms, and other vegetables that perfectly complement our famous broth. Seafood lovers will also not be left out with our fresh seafood list. Mongolian Hot Pot serves as the forerunner to the modern fondue. Its history stems back hundreds of years to the nomadic Mongols, where tribes would gather to cook fresh meats in a communal pot with simmering broth. Today, hot pot still focuses on the fundamental ideas of fresh, healthy ingredients, sharing, friendship, family, and gathering!

general_info: Founded in 1975, Chili s Grill & Bar is a chain of restaurants with a location in East Brunswick, N.J. The restaurant s chicken special includes tacos, margarita grilled chicken, chicken crispers, Cajun chicken pasta and Monterey chicken. Its seafood menu offers shrimp, salmon and tilapia. The restaurant additionally provides several party platters of lettuce wraps, boneless buffalo wings, fajitas, grilled baby back ribs, turkey sandwiches and house salad bowls. Chili s Grill & Bar also serves the local communities and offers sponsorships for various organizations that include St. Jude Children s Research Hospital. Its starters menu includes Awesome Blossom, nachos, boneless shanghai wings, and spinach and artichoke dips. The restaurant also serves soups, salads, steaks, quesadillas, burgers and desserts.

name: Carrabba's Italian Grill
general_info: Carrabba s Italian Grill is a chain of casual dining restaurants with locations throughout the United States. Carrabba s is owned and operated by OSI Restaurant Partners. OSI Restaurant Partners' portfolio of brands consists of Outback Steakhouse, Bonefish Grill, Fleming's Prime Steakhouse & Wine Bar, Roy's, Lee Roy Selmon's, Blue Coral Seafood & Spirits and Cheeseburger in Paradise restaurants. It has operations in 50 states and 20 countries internationally. Carrabba s serves flavorful Italian dishes prepared from ingredients imported from around the world--fresh mussels rope grown in the icy cold waters off the coast of Prince Edward Island, or Borges extra virgin olive oil imported from Catalonia, Spain, and Garafolo pasta imported from a small town outside Pompeii. The restaurant uses only USDA Choice beef, and its chicken and fish are always fresh, never frozen. It also offers specialty drinks, including a citrotini, Italian sangria, pomegranate martini and wild berry cocktail. The restaurant features a dining room, patio and bar, with seating for more than 240 people. Carrabba s also offers gift cards for birthday parties, anniversaries and family celebrations. The restaurant maintains a location in East Brunswick, N.J.

name: Olive Garden Italian Restaurant
others: Cuisines: Family Style, American, Take Out, Italian, European, Continental
general_info: Since its founding in Orlando in 1982, Olive Garden has been dedicated to providing a warm, welcoming dining experience and Italian hospitality to everyone who walks in the door. Today, our 800+ restaurants have evolved with our customers’ favorites in mind.  Inspired by Italian generosity and love of amazing food, our menu is always expanding to ensure that there is something new to try and something everyone will enjoy. That means you can indulge in classic Italian favorites like Chicken Parmigiana and Fettuccine Alfredo served with the salad and breadsticks you love.  And take your pick from our scrumptious appetizers, entrees, desserts, wines and specialty drinks. Plus, explore special menus with children's, gluten-sensitive and lighter fare options.  Or order it all ToGo and have your favorite food ready for pickup. At Olive Garden, we believe that life is better together and everyone is happiest with family, however you define it. Which is why we encourage togetherness in everything we do.OWNER INFORMATIONBill Darden was just 19-years-old when he opened his first restaurant in 1938. It was a 25-seat luncheonette in Waycross, Ga., called The Green Frog and promised “Service with a Hop”. He went on to open the first Olive Garden in Orlando, Florida in 1982. Olive Garden continues to be the number one full-service Italian restaurant company in the country with more than 800 restaurants bringing Italian hospitality to hungry people around the world.

As expert chefs, we know that the best dishes start with the best ingredients. On our menu, you will find the finest Italian inspired dishes that the area has to offer, and we have spent years perfecting each and every item on our menu so that every dish is memorable. From our housemade raviolis to our signature cocktails, everything is crafted with an absolute attention to detail. The result is a journey of sorts, where each bite will transport you to the heart of Italy, and you will constantly have to remind yourself that you are not on a farm or a vineyard in Tuscany after each subsequent, delicious bite. general_info: The Spanish Tavern is the premier destination in New Jersey for awarding winning traditional and contemporary Spanish cuisine. Those who have dined with us at Spanish Tavern have come to know us as restaurant they can rely on for superb food, delicious drinks, exceptional service and a gorgeous environment to turn the every day and most special of occasions into warm memories. New Jersey Monthly Magazine has named Spanish Tavern as Best Spanish Restaurant in Northern New Jersey. Our menu is well rounded, with a large emphasis placed on seafood dishes due to the seaside Spanish regions where the owners are from. Favorites include our Shrimp in Garlic Sauce appetizer, Veal Corunesa, Twin Lobsters, Paella Valencia and Branzino Filet a la Plancha. Our lunch menu is accessible for casual lunch meetups in addition to being a smart choice for a business meeting. A children's menu allows for Spanish Tavern to be a dining option for the whole family. Our private dining room can host up to 75 guests for any event, including christenings, rehearsal dinners, wedding receptions, reunions and charity events. Spanish Tavern also excels at catering and would be happy to work with you to bring you vision to life. Come by or call for takeout to see why we're New Jersey's favorite Spanish restaurant!

Sit back, unwind and enjoy the truly unique Brazilian Steakhouse atmosphere where you will feast on a non-stop parade of freshly prepared food. The savory cuts of meat and poultry are brought to your table and carved tableside by authentic Gaucho chefs.To begin your experience Rio Rodizio has created an Ultimate Feast designed to please your hunger. Our lavish feast offers a wide variety of hot and cold dishes prepared fresh daily. The vibrant colors and arousing aromas of every platter will be sure to attract your senses. From fresh fruits and vegetables to tradtiional chicken salad, our selection of cold items will be prepared to please your taste buds. To make our feast especially unique, everyday a variety of sizzling hot dishes will be cooked to perfection. From seared tilapia to homemade lasagna, you can be sure there will be many options to keep you happy and satisfied. You may enjoy Rodizio & Ultimate Feast as much as you’d like, so take your time, relax and savor every bite.

name: The Stone House at Clove Lakes
general_info:
The perfect getaway in Clove Lakes Park. Escape the everyday grind and experience our fine dining in this picturesque setting on the lake. Enjoy brunch, lunch, dinner and cocktails. Have your wedding, anniversary, shower or corporate event perfectly planned by our professional staff. We will cater to your every need, and leave you with an incredibly memorable dining experience on our terrace or waterfront patio. See what the buzz is about! 
 
Also, located inside The Stone House restaurant is Chef's Loft, which is an intimate 16 to 20 seat loft overlooking Staten Island’s most romantic dining room. 
Experience an innovative tasting menu prepared uniquely each seating by chef / owner Peter Botros. The Chef’s Loft at The Stone House is among the most exclusive dining experiences in New York City. Make the entire Loft yours for an intimate special evening or share the extraordinary culinary journey with other distinguished gourmet enthusiasts.  A new tasting Menu is introduced each month consisting of 5 courses and includes wine and cocktail pairings for each course. 
 
The Chef’s Loft can also accommodate 12-20 people or up to 25 in a cocktail style setting. 
 
For reservations and membership inquiries for Chef's Loft, please email ChefsLoft@TheStoneHouseSI.com and one of our team members will get back to you with availability and further details.

name: Ruddy & Dean Restaurant
general_info:
Located on the beautiful St. George waterfront, Ruddy & Dean has a little something for everyone. Just across the street from the Staten Island Yankees' ballpark and the Staten Island Ferry, and only blocks from the St. George Theatre, Ruddy & Dean is a great place for sports fans, tourists, and theater-goers alike. Whether it's the breathtaking view of Manhattan across New York Harbor or our award-winning steaks, you will quickly why Ruddy & Dean is a favorite of so many people. 
We have a full-service kitchen in which we cut our own steaks from beef that is hand selected by owner Danny Mills. Our steaks are aged 7-10 days to maintain optimal beef flavor. Our chef, a graduate of the prestigious Culinary Institute of America, has a knack for infusing other delectable entrées for the non-beef lover. Our party room, with a terrace overlooking Manhattan, has a 125 person capacity. We offer delicious and tasty catering options for all occasions. 
 
For an intimate dinner for two, a business lunch, or a large party, Ruddy & Dean is the perfect place for everyone to enjoy fine food and fantastic views. Though on Staten Island, Ruddy & Dean is quickly making a name for itself among the big-name steakhouses in the city.

general_info:
Fresh is in our food: 
Each day, you’ll find an updated selection of fresh fish on our Today’s Fresh Fish menu, not to mention live Maine lobster, freshly baked Cheddar Bay Biscuits™, crisp salads and a host of fresh seafood recipes waiting to be explored. 
Fresh is in our knowledge: 
No one knows seafood better than we do. As global seafood buyers, we have employees stationed throughout the world who inspect our seafood the moment it comes out of the water. They ensure it meets standards that are second to none. Then, the renowned chefs at our culinary center deliver the fresh expertise that turns it all into something truly special. 
Fresh is in our dedication: 
We hold ourselves to the highest standards for service, quality and a welcoming atmosphere. And we’re focused on doing what’s right – for our employees, in our communities and in the world. 
Fresh is in our commitment: 
You deserve the freshest food and thinking. So every time you visit one of our seafood restaurants or our online seafood store, you’ll find an uncommon commitment to deliver the best of the sea with fresh energy and fresh ideas that we hope will make you want to come back again and again

general_info: Since the Bubbakoo’s Burritos opened its doors in Point Pleasant, New Jersey back in 2008. It was apparent that this was a great place to relax and have an awesome meal. More than ten years later, Bubbakoo’s has expanded to multiple locations along the Jersey Shore and has served thousands of its legendary burritos to very loyal customers.

name: Kasai
general_info: Captivate your senses in New Brunswick's newest and hottest spot for fine dining. At Kasai Restaurant, our menu features Japanese-focused Asian fusion cuisine in a setting that has to be experienced to be understood. Adorned with warm, vibrant lighting and glowing decor, our ambiance does our Japanese name justice. Translated as "wildfire," Kasai seeks to give guests a dining adventure that's sizzling with flavor, burning with passion, and shimmering with style. Whether you're escaping the office for a sushi lunch or hosting an event with us, you'll leave filled with the fire that our restaurant inspires.

name: LongHorn Steakhouse
general_info:
Satisfy your craving for steak! Check out our exclusive steak specials. 
 
At LongHorn Steakhouse, we pride ourselves on our fresh, boldly seasoned & expertly grilled steaks. We also serve up fresh seafood, juicy chicken & fall-off-the-bone ribs slow roasted in our homemade BBQ sauce.   We strive to be the best steakhouse in everything we do. One visit and you'll experience our grill master's Legendary Steaks like our center-cut Flo's Filet or Prime Rib. Try bold flavors from our seasonal Chef's Showcase Menu or signature entrees like Parmesan Crusted Chicken or LongHorn Salmon. Our lunch menu also features over 30 different combinations, including our LongHorn salads and Steakhouse burgers. And don't forget to save room for our Chocolate Stampede.   Come in today & enjoy what we call a "cut-above" experience - delicious food & great service in a relaxing atmosphere.

name: Piattino - A Neighborhood Bistro
general_info: Nestled in Historic Summit NJ, Piattino is serving up great Italian Fare with a modern twist, sourcing artisan ingredients from across the world and our own back yard. Our chef has crafted a menu full of new takes on classic entrees and pastas. And, our stone-fired 800° oven results in authentic Neapolitan style pizzas and sandizza’s (our version of a Panini) with ingredients ranging from truffled wild mushrooms to 24 month aged prosciutto di Parma. The cocktails are made from scratch infused with house made simple syrups, fresh fruit and herbs that complement the menu along with a carefully selected wine and beer list. It is our goal to create a warm and inviting atmosphere with exceptional service for the neighborhood for years to come. We have a very large private dining area which is great for rehearsal dinners, bridal showers or any kind of business gathering. We also offer catering packages for offsite events. Our Events & Catering Manager is readily available to help plan your event!

name: Office Tavern Grill
general_info: The Office Tavern Grill opened its first location in Morristown in June of 2014. In December, 2015, a year and a half later, the Summit location joined the team. A reinvention of what was an iconic New Jersey restaurant chain, The Office Tavern Grill prides itself on providing its guests with a crafted experience. The menu is a modern American cuisine take on classic comforts, paired with 40 rotating taps and hand crafted cocktails. Our Monthly “Road Trip” around the United States provides our guests with regionally sourced ingredients, state specific classics, and small batch crafted beers.

All of our pizzas are made with fresh mozzarella or traditional cheese, cooked to perfection, topped with fresh basil. From the distressed steel, glass-enclosed two-story wine tower, and wood-burning fireplace, this artfully designed space sets an elegant yet decidedly cozy ambiance. others: Cuisines: Burgers, American, Take Out, Hot Dogs, Bar & Grills
general_info: In Manhattan in 1965, there was no place where people could go out to meet friends and make new ones in an environment that was at once both relaxed and yet exciting. Then, Alan Stillman opened Fridays as a way, he said, "to meet Pan Am stewardesses." Suddenly, there was a place with great food, new and exciting drinks and an electric energy. A place where bartenders mixed the environment just as well as they mixed drinks. In short, a place like nowhere else. Today, Fridays in Springfield Township, NJ is still America's most iconic bar and grill. We embrace and celebrate our heritage as a bar. One that just happens to serve killer food in an environment where it's always Friday.

general_info: Founded in 1975, Chili s Grill & Bar is a chain of restaurants with a location in Holmdel, N.J. The restaurant s chicken special includes tacos, margarita grilled chicken, chicken crispers, Cajun chicken pasta and Monterey chicken. Its seafood menu offers shrimp, salmon and tilapia. The restaurant additionally provides several party platters of lettuce wraps, boneless buffalo wings, fajitas, grilled baby back ribs, turkey sandwiches and house salad bowls. Chili s Grill & Bar also serves the local communities and offers sponsorships for various organizations that include St. Jude Children s Research Hospital. Its starters menu includes Awesome Blossom, nachos, boneless shanghai wings, and spinach and artichoke dips. The restaurant also serves soups, salads, steaks, quesadillas, burgers and desserts.

name: Khun Thai Restaurant
others: Cuisines: Asian, Family Style, Take Out, Thai
general_info: At Khun Thai, every dish is carefully crafted to offer a diversity of flavors and aromas that are sure to allow you to experience your food. Our head chef is originally from Thailand and uses many family recipes to create authentic Thai dishes. Whether you're new to Thai cuisine or a seasoned Thai food diner, our dishes offer a diversity of flavors and aromas that will surely make relish every bite. As with tradition Thai cuisine, there is a strong emphasis placed on lightly prepared dishes with aromatic components. Our dishes are never one dimensional in flavor, rather, each dish has a balance of sour, sweet, and salty. We hope you will dine with us Khun Thai and experience authentic Thai and Asian Fusion cuisine.

name: Denino's Pizza Place
general_info: Welcoming your loved ones to our family-friendly restaurant. Owner Michael Denino's father created his first authentic NY style pizza in 1951. Michael's strove to bring traditional quality pizza to Denino's Pizza Place. Our restaurant always uses the freshest ingredients available to make your dishes. We have been rated in the top 10 in New York City for the last 30 years. Our menu has a large selection of pizza, calzones, appetizers, salads, pasta, platters, paninis, wraps, subs, heroes, beverages, and desserts. We're open 6 days a week! Do you have an upcoming event or party and need to feed a large crowd of guests? Leave it to our restaurant to feed the masses with our catering services! We can be ready in a day's notice! If you're trying to stay healthy, are on a diet, or vegetarian, we have delicious salads with fat-free dressing options as well. We care about you! Our paninis, wraps, and heroes are all stuffed with the finest and fresh ingredients. They'll make your mouth water and you'll scarf it down! If you have a small appetite, are joining us for lunch, we do have smaller lunch portions available. You can also share plates! Quench your thirst with our large selection of hot and cold beverages. Alfresco Dining during the warm months.

name: Stage Left
others: Cuisines: Caterers, American, French, Steakhouse, European, Continental, Bar & Grills
general_info: Restaurateurs Francis Schott and Mark Pascal operate two of New Jersey's most storied restaurants. Stage Left Steak -- celebrating its 25th anniversary in 2017 -- is famous for its wood-grilled steaks, award-winning wine list and pioneering cocktail program, and has been an incubator for many of the NY region's top chefs and mixologists. Serving Brooklyn-Italian style fare, Catherine Lombardi opened in 2005, paying homage to the cooking of Mark's grandmother. Executive Chef James (J.R.) Belt presides over both kitchens. Ricky Stevens is Chef de Cuisine of Stage Left Steak. Schott + Pascal bonded over their shared love of food and drink upon meeting at Rutgers. For more than 8 years, the duo hosted the podcast, The Restaurant Guys, chatting with esteemed culinary guests from Gael Greene and John Mariani to Ruth Reichl and Chefs Eric Ripert and Grant Achatz.

name: Carrabba's Italian Grill
general_info: Carrabba s Italian Grill is a chain of casual dining restaurants with locations throughout the United States. Carrabba s is owned and operated by OSI Restaurant Partners. OSI Restaurant Partners' portfolio of brands consists of Outback Steakhouse, Bonefish Grill, Fleming's Prime Steakhouse & Wine Bar, Roy's, Lee Roy Selmon's, Blue Coral Seafood & Spirits and Cheeseburger in Paradise restaurants. It has operations in 50 states and 20 countries internationally. Carrabba s serves flavorful Italian dishes prepared from ingredients imported from around the world--fresh mussels rope grown in the icy cold waters off the coast of Prince Edward Island, or Borges extra virgin olive oil imported from Catalonia, Spain, and Garafolo pasta imported from a small town outside Pompeii. The restaurant uses only USDA Choice beef, and its chicken and fish are always fresh, never frozen. It also offers specialty drinks, including a citrotini, Italian sangria, pomegranate martini and wild berry cocktail. The restaurant features a dining room, patio and bar, with seating for more than 240 people. Carrabba s also offers gift cards for birthday parties, anniversaries and family celebrations. The restaurant maintains a location in Green Brook, N.J.

general_info: Eat. Drink. Be Happy. What does it take to be a regular at Bar Louie East Brunswick? An enjoyment of the craft and the desire to experience something out of the ordinary. From our Chicago roots, we've always known that having a comfortable place to hang out, get great drinks, scratch food, awesome music, and the best service was something special. We create every Bar Louie with all of that in mind. It might not seem like an easy task, but we want to make sure you have a great time, any time you decide to come in. We could make it easier on ourselves, but we live for the quality and uniqueness of what we create. From our handcrafted everything bar, to our scratch everything kitchen, it's in our DNA to be the best. We're at our best when you're having a great time. It may not be normal and it certainly isn't ordinary, but we believe you deserve more than ordinary. If you're not a regular yet... You will be.

name: Olive Garden Italian Restaurant
others: Cuisines: Family Style, American, Take Out, Italian, European, Continental
general_info: Since its founding in Orlando in 1982, Olive Garden has been dedicated to providing a warm, welcoming dining experience and Italian hospitality to everyone who walks in the door. Today, our 800+ restaurants have evolved with our customers’ favorites in mind.  Inspired by Italian generosity and love of amazing food, our menu is always expanding to ensure that there is something new to try and something everyone will enjoy. That means you can indulge in classic Italian favorites like Chicken Parmigiana and Fettuccine Alfredo served with the salad and breadsticks you love.  And take your pick from our scrumptious appetizers, entrees, desserts, wines and specialty drinks. Plus, explore special menus with children's, gluten-sensitive and lighter fare options.  Or order it all ToGo and have your favorite food ready for pickup. At Olive Garden, we believe that life is better together and everyone is happiest with family, however you define it. Which is why we encourage togetherness in everything we do.OWNER INFORMATIONBill Darden was just 19-years-old when he opened his first restaurant in 1938. It was a 25-seat luncheonette in Waycross, Ga., called The Green Frog and promised “Service with a Hop”. He went on to open the first Olive Garden in Orlando, Florida in 1982. Olive Garden continues to be the number one full-service Italian restaurant company in the country with more than 800 restaurants bringing Italian hospitality to hungry people around the world.

name: Bobby Van's Steak House

Upon entering, one is greeted with the sight of a credenza groaning under the weight of large bottles of wine. A bar full of regular customers is on the left and looking into the one-hundred seat dining room, one sees the thirty foot high ceiling and windows overlooking Park Avenue. To complement our Prime Aged Steaks our Sommelier has created an award winning wine list. Whether you're looking for a big Cabernet, a Pinot Noir or something in between our comprehensive list is sure to please. "

name: Due Mari
general_info: Chef Michael White and the Altamarea Group are excited to invite you to Due Mari. Located in the heart of New Brunswick, New Jersey, Due Mari, meaning "two seas" in Italian, opened its doors in September 2008. Due Mari keeping true to its name, features the freshest seafood from around the world and Chef White's authentic Italian cuisine. Upon entering Due Mari, you are greeted by bright blue, aqua and cream tones. Our sleek, vibrant circular bar, located in the center of the restaurant, invites guests to linger with a cocktail or enjoy our full menu. Due Mari is a place to meet family, friends and new acquaintances in a convivial atmosphere.  In addition to the freshest Italian seafood, Due Mari's menu also features a wide selection of Chef White's signature handmade pastas and choice grilled meats. The broad range of cuisine, both inland and coastal, covers traditional and modern influences, allowing Chef Michael White and his culinary team an open canvas from which to draw on. Due Mari's seasonal and regional influences can be seen throughout each course of the menu with dishes like the Polipo: grilled octopus, pickled onion, celery, taggiasca olive. Or the Spada: local grilled swordfish, swiss chard, white bean, acqua pazza.  The wine list at Due Mari offers guests a varied selection from the major wine regions of Italy.  The wines are selected to compliment the cuisine for a harmonious dining experience.  Whether they are looking for a well-known treasure or small, boutique wineries, the list provides guests the opportunity to explore Italy's myriad of wine styles. The list also includes selections from France and the United States for guests wishing to enjoy great wines from regions outside Italy. The extensive wine list is complimented by world-renowned mixologist, Eben Freeman's irresistible cocktail and bar list.  Due Mari offers private and semi-private dining spaces for any type of event. From corporate functions to personal celebrations, luncheons, and cocktail parties, we're happy to customize all aspects of your event to create a memorable experience.   Due Mari is thrilled to be a part of the New Jersey community, alongside our sister restaurant, Osteria Morini in Bernardsville. We look forward to welcoming you.

name: Pizzeria Bel Giardino
general_info: Bel Giardino is a Gourmet Authentic Italian Restaurant & Pizzeria located conveniently in the heart of downtown Cranford, NJ. Bel Giardino serves up fine Italian specialties, gourmet pizzas, as well as unique authentic Italian fare. With a cozy front room for you and your family to enjoy your favorite pizzeria offerings and our private elegant BYOB dining room for quiet intimate dinners Bel Giardino has something for everyone. We offer fresh seasonal homemade soups & salads, gourmet pasta dishes, authentic Italian specialties, chicken, veal, seafood entrees, and one of a kind house specialties that will keep you coming back for more. We also offer traditional pizzeria classics such as hot & cold sandwiches, wraps, paninis, burgers,wings, calzones, strombolis, and of course Cranford’s favorite pizza! If all that wasn’t enough, we can also make over 90% of our menu GLUTEN FREE! Come down today and see how Bel Giardino truly brings the Soul of Italy to the Heart of Cranford!

general_info: Founded in 1975, Chili s Grill & Bar is a chain of restaurants with a location in Staten Island, N.Y. The restaurant s chicken special includes tacos, margarita grilled chicken, chicken crispers, Cajun chicken pasta and Monterey chicken. Its seafood menu offers shrimp, salmon and tilapia. The restaurant additionally provides several party platters of lettuce wraps, boneless buffalo wings, fajitas, grilled baby back ribs, turkey sandwiches and house salad bowls. Chili s Grill & Bar also serves the local communities and offers sponsorships for various organizations that include St. Jude Children s Research Hospital. Its starters menu includes Awesome Blossom, nachos, boneless shanghai wings, and spinach and artichoke dips. The restaurant also serves soups, salads, steaks, quesadillas, burgers and desserts.

name: Penang Malaysian Cuisine
others: Cuisines: Asian, Caterers, Take Out, Thai, Healthy, Seafood, Chinese, Vegetarian, Vegan
general_info: In Southeast Asia, street food represents the best food you can find. Drinks are served in plastic bags, rice comes hand-wrapped in fresh banana leaves or printed newspaper. Small shops and carts cooking simple home style food.​ Sometimes portable, sometimes not. You can always tell a delicious street food stall by the amount of people crowded around small wobbly tables sitting on even smaller stools. Slurpring noodles, sipping kopi, raising a bottle. This is what street food means to us. Simple and good. Casual and fun. Always delicious. Born on the streets of Penang, Malaysia

Every item on Mara’s menu is made to order with high-quality ingredients and great care is taken to ensure that you receive a top-notch dining experience at a relaxed pace. We look forward to having you dine with us.

name: Denny's
general_info:
For more than 65 years Denny’s has been bringing people together over great food. It’s the place where people can relax and be themselves; where they can enjoy classic American comfort food and everyday value. 24 hours a day. 365 days a year. Here, you can order the usual or try something new — like our Big Bourbon Flavors menu featuring the NEW! Apple Bourbon Pancake Breakfast. Or, get all your favorite breakfast items at one low price with the Super Slam - back for a limited time only. 
 
While the restaurants have been updated and the menu changed, Denny's still kept all your favorites like Moons Over My Hammy®, Sizzlin’ Skillets, hand-dipped Milk Shakes, 100% Beef Burgers and the world-famous Build Your Own Grand Slam®. Whether it's appetizers, breakfast, lunch, dinner or dessert, we pride ourselves on an expansive menu featuring delicious, innovative options that cater to the taste and dietary requirements of every guest that walks in the door. So friends and family can come in, sit down and connect in the place that’s made for it. See you at Denny's.

general_info: Established in 1899, Echo Lake Country Club is a recreational facility that features an 18-hole golf course and a private dining room. The club provides catering services for rehearsal dinners, reception parties, corporate seminars and business meetings. It offers several types of membership plans. Echo Lake Country Club provides a range of golf and tennis lesson packages, as well as video analysis and custom club fitting services. The club also features a swimming pool, locker rooms and tennis courts. In addition, it operates a refreshment area that serves a variety of snacks and soft drinks. Echo Lake Country Club has a pro shop that stocks various golf accessories and sports outfits.

name: Smashburger
general_info: Smashburger is an innovative restaurant concept that is redefining its category by providing a burger experience that combines the superior product, service and atmosphere associated with sit-down casual dining and the speed and convenience associated with quick-service restaurants. With its handcrafted menu items ranging from smashed-to-order burgers, handspun Haagen-Dazs milkshakes, chicken sandwiches, salads, and sides made with fresh, premium ingredients and served in less than six minutes, Smashburger is putting the burger back at the center of the consumer dining experience. As the fastest restaurant company to reach the 100-unit milestone, Smashburger is well on its way to becoming a leading international brand.

general_info: Three dining options: First, The original StageHouse Restaurant, offering fine dining in an elegant county inn setting. Built in 1737 this historic inn boasts many small dining rooms with a fireplace in each room. The Stage House Restaurant offers an ala carte menu every day. Next, The Tavern at the Stage House, which serves up Rustic American fare in a more casual setting. Newly renovated with a new 35 seat bar, a cool little club house and the best Burger in Town. Lastly, The Patio at the stage house, which is a huge outdoor bar and dining room offering either menu. Reservations are only accepted for the fine dining restaurant, the others are first come first serve.

address: 331 New Dorp Ln, Staten Island, NY 10306

general_info: Built on over 20 years of family business and a renowned reputation amongst the Chinese community for its Dim-Sum destinations, The Jade Restaurant Group is proud to bring you Jade Asian Bistro. The group's seminal restaurant, Jing Fong, located in the heart of Chinatown has provided New York City with authentic Hong Kong-style Dim Sum for decades. Their seasoned Chinese chefs use fresh ingredients and their years of experience to give you a culinary experience like no other. Also relative to Jing Fong, is Jade Asian Restaurant located right off of Flushing's hustling and bustling Main St. The restaurant's captivating main dining room is known to host banquet style weddings during the evening while serving up a tremendous array of signature Chinese Dim-Sum for lunch. Jade Asian Bistro now opens its doors to the Staten Island community, providing the same unique experiences as its sibling restaurants without having to leave the Island! With a classical interior design reminiscent of Chinese tea parlors and a team of Chefs who specialize in South East Asian cuisine, Jade Asian Bistro is bringing a modern flare to a traditional style of eating.

name: Urban Griddle
general_info:
Located in the heart of New Jersey’s earliest urban community, Urban Griddle features fresh, homemade American fare in a casual urban-rustic setting, serving breakfast, brunch and lunch every day. The restaurant is appointed with rustic inspired 150 year old reclaimed middle America barn wood, and an urban inspired corrugated tin ceiling.  
 
Inspired by our love of food and service we offer our guests an array of American comfort food favorites, fresh cracked egg omelets, delectable variations of pancakes, ooey gooey challah french toast, sweet and savory belgian waffles, fresh seasonal salads, paninis, burritos, and burgers including an array of vegetarian options.  
 
We also feature local craft bottled beers, brunch style cocktails, and an array of coffees prepared by our trained baristas. Allow us to share with you our craft.

name: Red Lobster
others: Cuisines: Family Style, American, Take Out, Italian, Steakhouse, European, Seafood, Continental
general_info:
Fresh is in our food: 
Each day, you’ll find an updated selection of fresh fish on our Today’s Fresh Fish menu, not to mention live Maine lobster, freshly baked Cheddar Bay Biscuits™, crisp salads and a host of fresh seafood recipes waiting to be explored. 
Fresh is in our knowledge:

general_info: In Manhattan in 1965, there was no place where people could go out to meet friends and make new ones in an environment that was at once both relaxed and yet exciting. Then, Alan Stillman opened Fridays as a way, he said, "to meet Pan Am stewardesses." Suddenly, there was a place with great food, new and exciting drinks and an electric energy. A place where bartenders mixed the environment just as well as they mixed drinks. In short, a place like nowhere else. Today, Fridays in Staten Island, NY is still America's most iconic bar and grill. We embrace and celebrate our heritage as a bar. One that just happens to serve killer food in an environment where it's always Friday.

name: Millie's Of Staten Island
general_info: Millie's of Staten Island in the Bricktown Center at Charleston (185 Bricktown Way, Staten Island, NY 10309). Millie's of Staten Island is an elevated neighborhood dining destination for families, friends and couples serving lunch and dinner featuring their signature coal- and wood-fired pizzas, famous meatballs and salads. Millie’s serves delicious, coal- and Neapolitan wood-fired artisan pizzas and meatballs based on Vince and Brandon’s grandmother Millie’s recipes. The coal oven burns over 650+ degrees and can produce pies in five minutes. The Neapolitan wood oven, hand built by Italy’s celebrated Ferrara family, and imported from Naples, cooks pizzas in just 90 seconds thanks to intense 800+ degree heat. Millie’s also offers their famous meatballs, fresh-made “Pot of Balls” for pick-up or delivery locally and ready to eat. The bar serve's craft cocktails, twenty beers and 5 wines on tap and the wine list will features over 40 bottles from Italy and around the world.

general_info: Welcome to The Armory. Located directly on Perth Amboy's historic waterfront, The Armory is a hidden jewel that showcases a unique and beautiful view of the Raritan Bay and the New York borough of Staten Island. This completely restored naval ammunition building was once used during World Wars I & II and is now acclaimed to be one of New Jersey's finest historical treasures. Summer Hours for the kitchen are as follows: Monday thru Thursday : 11:30am to 10pm Friday thru Saturday : 11:30am to 11pm Sunday : 12pm to 10pm Summer Hours for the Tiki-bar are as follows: Monday thru Thursday : 11:30am to 11pm Friday thru Saturday : 11:30am to Midnight Sunday : 12pm to 11pm Thank you and we hope to see you soon.

others: Cuisines: Family Style, American, Take Out, Steakhouse
general_info:
Our New Bone In, Bold Flavor dishes are expertly fire grilled. Choose from our NEW Grilled Lamb Chops, NEW Pork Porterhouse or Outlaw Ribeye. 
At LongHorn Steakhouse, we pride ourselves on our fresh, boldly seasoned & expertly grilled steaks. We also serve up fresh seafood, juicy chicken & fall-off-the-bone ribs slow roasted in our homemade BBQ sauce.   We strive to be the best steakhouse in everything we do. One visit and you'll experience our grill master's Legendary Steaks like our center-cut Flo's Filet or Prime Rib. Try bold flavors from our seasonal Chef's Showcase Menu or signature entrees like Parmesan Crusted Chicken or LongHorn Salmon. Our lunch menu also features over 30 different combinations, including our LongHorn salads and Steakhouse burgers. And don't forget to save room for our Chocolate Stampede.   Come in today & enjoy what we call a "cut-above" experience - delicious food & great service in a relaxing atmosphere.

name: Mulberry Street Restaurant & Bar
general_info: Mulberry Street Restaurant specializes in Italian cuisine, made from fresh ingredients. Located in Woodbridge, N.J., its menu includes great appetizers, homemade bread and freshly-prepared pastas. The restaurant serves veal, chicken, fresh fish entrees, as well as offers steak and chops specials. It has a full-service bar which provides a range of wines, coffees and featured martinis. Mulberry Street Restaurant offers lunch packages, including house and caesar salads, sausage peppers and onions, eggplant rollatine as well as cavatelli and broccoli, among others.

name: Olive Garden Italian Restaurant
others: Cuisines: Family Style, American, Take Out, Italian, European, Continental
general_info: Since its founding in Orlando in 1982, Olive Garden has been dedicated to providing a warm, welcoming dining experience and Italian hospitality to everyone who walks in the door. Today, our 800+ restaurants have evolved with our customers’ favorites in mind.  Inspired by Italian generosity and love of amazing food, our menu is always expanding to ensure that there is something new to try and something everyone will enjoy. That means you can indulge in classic Italian favorites like Chicken Parmigiana and Fettuccine Alfredo served with the salad and breadsticks you love.  And take your pick from our scrumptious appetizers, entrees, desserts, wines and specialty drinks. Plus, explore special menus with children's, gluten-sensitive and lighter fare options.  Or order it all ToGo and have your favorite food ready for pickup. At Olive Garden, we believe that life is better together and everyone is happiest with family, however you define it. Which is why we encourage togetherness in everything we do.OWNER INFORMATIONBill Darden was just 19-years-old when he opened his first restaurant in 1938. It was a 25-seat luncheonette in Waycross, Ga., called The Green Frog and promised “Service with a Hop”. He went on to open the first Olive Garden in Orlando, Florida in 1982. Olive Garden continues to be the number one full-service Italian restaurant company in the country with more than 800 restaurants bringing Italian hospitality to hungry people around the world.
